A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After waiting two years to watch the continuation of this trilogy\, I was disgusted with the result. This was a Star Wars movie with no lightsaber duels or any epic scene. This movie turned into a comedy and had so much unnecessary scenes that destroyed the entire movie. What a disgrace of a movie. I can honestly say that the prequel trilogy is better than this garbage. Don't go watch it\, save your money people.
